text: Those High Grey Walls is a 1939 American film directed by Charles Vidor. A doctor is sent to prison for treating a man wanted by the police. It is also known as The Gates of Alcatraz. ==Cast== *Walter Connolly as Dr. MacAuley *Onslow Stevens as Dr. Frank Norton *Paul Fix as Nightingale *Bernard Nedell as Redlands *Iris Meredith as Mary MacAuley *Oscar O'Shea as Warden *Nicholas Soussanin as "Lindy" Lindstrom *Don Beddoe as Jockey *Philip Van Zandt as Freddie (uncredited) ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:American films Category:American crime drama films Category:Columbia Pictures films Category:Films directed by Charles Vidor Category:Films set in prison Category:1939 crime drama films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1939 drama films Category:1939 films
title: Those High Grey Walls
